title: User can view an existing Report Date transaction
custom_preconds: Given there is an existing Report Date Tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on the tx in a player's Player History
custom_expected: THEN the tx will open in the same window

title: User can create a new Report Date transaction for a player from their Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a player's Player History
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Create New > Transactions > Major > Assignments> Report Date
custom_expected:
THEN a new Preliminary tx will load
BUT if a submitted or rejected tx was created within 10 days of the current date
THEN the system will load the existing tx in view or edit mode, depending on its state.

title: As a user I want to receive a warning if the Major League active or under control limit will be exceeded with this report date transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Major Lg Org has a Max Under or Active Roster
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Submit or Approve for a Report Date tx
custom_expected:
THEN the warning will display:

"The club [Major League club name] will exceed the Active List or Under Control limit.
Active Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]
Under Control Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]"

title: User can submit a Report Date to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a Report Date tx filled out
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Submit
custom_expected:
THEN the system will update the status of the tx to "Submitted to BOC"
AND set the player's pending major roster status to "Active"
AND Player's Player History displays the tx Code = REPDT, Description = Report Date, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields in green
AND an approval item will be generated on the BOC approvals widget

title: A BOC approver will receive an error when approving a report date transaction with an assignment date after the current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC Approver
custom_steps:
WHEN Clicking Approve
AND the assignment date is after the current date
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."

title: A BOC Approver will receive an error when approving a report date transaction for a player that has earlier transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a Report Date tx
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking approve
AND the assignment date is before the latest approved or pending tx date
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "A transaction cannot occur before the date of player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: A BOC user can approve a report date transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC Approver
AND the Report Date status is Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Approve
custom_expected:
THEN the status will update to Approved
AND will reload in view mode
AND a blue notification is displayed 
AND the approval item will be removed
AND player's MJ Roster Status to Active
AND update player's Player History:  Code = RPTDT, Description = Report Date, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font.

title: A BOC user can reject a report date transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC Approver
AND the Report Date status is Submitted to BOC
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reject
custom_expected:
THEN the status will update to Rejected
AND will reload in view mode
AND a blue notification is displayed 
AND the approval item will be removed
AND reverse player's pending org and club, Pending MJ Roster Status and Pending MN Roster Status
AND remove pending player history entry

title: A Club user will receive a notification when a report date transaction is approved, rejected or reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a club user
AND on the Notifications Widget
custom_steps:
WHEN a Report Date Tx has been Approved, Rejected, or Reversed
BUT NOT suppressed
custom_expected:
THEN a notification will display
AND the description will be a hyperlink to the tx

title: A user can delete a report date transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has edit permissions
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking Delete
AND the Report Date tx is in Preliminary or Rejected state
custom_expected:
THEN the form will be closed
AND no record will be kept
AND user will be returned to entry point of the tx

title: A user can edit an existing report date transaction for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Report Date tx is in view mode
AND the tx is in a preliminary and rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Edit as a BOC or Club user
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can edit all fields in all states except for Approved and Reversed transactions
AND Approved and Reversed transactions, edit only gives BOC access to attach new files or edit existing attachments. 
AND BOC approvers can update "Comments" and "BOC Notes" fields
AND CLUB users can attach new files in any state other than Preliminary or Rejected. 
AND Club cannot edit existing attachments or any other part of transaction

title: A BOC user can reverse a report date transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC Approver
AND the tx is in Approved State
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reverse
custom_expected:
THEN the successful reverse notification will be displayed
AND the status is updated to Reversed
AND player history will display reversed tx with "Voided"
AND the player's Club, MJ and MN Roster statuses and level of play will update to their values from prior to the transaction being approved
BUT if the tx is not the most recent approved tx for the player, then the user will receive an error message "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed."

title: A BOC user can reverse and suppress a report date transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC Approver
AND the tx is in Approved State
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reverse and Suppress
custom_expected:
THEN the tx will first reverse
AND then be suppressed
the successful reverse notification will be displayed
AND will be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches and any other place where it is visible on UI
AND the player's Club, MJ and MN Roster statuses and level of play will update to their values from prior to the transaction being approved
BUT if the tx is not the most recent approved tx for the player, then the user will receive an error message "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed."

title: A BOC user can suppress a report date transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC Approver
AND the tx is in Reversed state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Suppress
custom_expected:
THEN the tx will be suppressed
AND will be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches and any other place where it is visible on UI

title: Report Date Permissions - BOC - Major Transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN handling a Report Date tx
custom_expected:
THEN can view and print all MJ league tx in all states
AND can view all flags for all tx and attachments in all states
AND can create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all MJ league tx for any MJ League player
AND can Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress
BUT Basic BOC can only view, print and view flags

title: Report Date Permissions - Club - Major Transactions (Admin)
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is a ADMIN Club user
custom_steps: WHEN handling a Report Date tx
custom_expected:
THEN can create create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all MJ tx for MJ league players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org"
AND can view and print all MJ league tx in all states when Org matches From Org
AND can view all approved MJ tx including other clubs MJ tx
BUT cannot view suppressed
AND cannot see BOC Notes field
AND  cannot see comments or attached files for tx of other Orgs

title: Report Date Permissions - Club - Major Transactions (Basic)
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is a BASIC Club user
custom_steps: WHEN handling a Report Date tx
custom_expected:
THEN can view and print all MJ league tx in all states when logged in ORG matches the "From Org"
AND can view all approved MJ tx
BUT cannot see suppressed tx, edit or change tx, or see BOC notes field
AND cannot see comments field of other ORGs, or attached files of other ORGS

title: Return of 26th Man Permissions - BOC - MJ tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN in a Return of 26th man tx
custom_expected:
THEN user can view and Print all major league transactions in all states for Major League Players
AND can view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states
AND can create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND can Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions and see associated Flags
BUT if BOC basic user can only print and view flags

title: Return of 26th Man Permissions - Club - MJ tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is a Club user
custom_steps: WHEN in a Return of 26th man tx
custom_expected:

AND can view all APPROVED major league tx including other club's Major League tx or BOC only tx
AND can create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League tx for Major League players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org"
BUT cannot view suppressed tx and see BOC notes field

title: Club user will receive a notification upon approver, reject, or reverse of a tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is Club user
AND is on the notifications clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN a Return of 26th man tx is moved to approve, reject, or reverse
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a notification that the tx was updated to "Approved", "Rejected", or "Reversed"
AND "Description" and "Players Name" will be a hyperlink 
BUT if tx is suppressed all notifications for the current tx will be removed from the notifications clipboard

title: BOC user see flags on Return of 26th man tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN any warning or errors occur that are marked a flags for a Return of 26th man tx
custom_expected:
THEN when on the Approvals clipboard for that approval item a flag will be visible
AND when clicking on the flags icon opens a popover with the flags that are currently set for the form
BUT flags are dismissed on Approve or Reject

title: Edit an existing Return of 26th man tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a Return of 26th man tx for a player
AND it is in a preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN the tx is in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN a club user can attach new files
AND a boc user can edit all fields in all states
BUT if tx is approved or reversed boc can only attach new files and edit existing attachments
AND update comments and boc notes fields

title: Error if player does not have an approved appointment of 26th man tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN player does not have an approved Appointment of 26th Man tx
custom_steps: WHEN selecting Return of 26th man from the create new menu
custom_expected:
THEN an error will display "You can only use this transaction to return a recently appointed 26th Man."
BUT if an approved Appointment of 26th Man tx is found more than 2 days ago
THEN an error will display "Player's latest Appointment of 26th Man transaction was prior to two days in the past on {mm/dd/yyyy}. "

title: Club user can not initiate a return of 26th man tx for a player that does not belong to the club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a club user
AND selected a player that does not belong to their Org
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Return of 26th Man" from the create new menu from their Player History
custom_expected: THEN Error will display "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization.", "If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact the BOC."

title: Error if player attempting to return is not on a roster
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a roster status for MN or MJ of Free Agent, Released, or Released
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Return of 26th Man" from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "This transaction can only be performed on a player who is currently affiliated with an organization."

title: Error if player attempting to return's club is at the MN level

custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Return of 26th Man" from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "This transaction is for Major League players only"

title: Error if player attempting to return's not Active
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have a pending MJ Roster Status of "Active"
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Return of 26th Man" from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "[Player Roster Last] must be Active to be assigned."

title: Error if a return of 26th man for a pending or approved tx after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a "Return of 26th Man" has the assignment date before the latest approved or pending tx date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error message displays "A transaction cannot occur before the date of <Roster Name Last Name>'s latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: Error if returning a player outside of the season
custom_preconds: GIVEN a "Return of 26th Man" has an assignment date prior to the Spring Training date or After the Last Day of MJ Season date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "[Player Roster Last] cannot be Returned in the period between the close of the regularly scheduled season and spring training."

title: Error if back or future date of Return of 26th man's assignment date is more than 10 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN a "Return of 26th Man" tx is not back or future dated more than 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "Assignment Date must be within 10 days of submission."

title: Warning if MN league club's active or under control limit will be exceeded

title: Edit an existing designated for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an existing Designate for Release or Assignment for a player
custom_steps: WHEN clicking the Edit button
custom_expected:
THEN the form will reload in edit mode 
AND BOC is able to edit all fields in all states except for Approved and Reversed transactions
AND clubs only have access to attach new files in any state other than Preliminary or Rejected. 
AND clubs cannot edit existing attachments or any other part of transaction
AND on Approved and Reversed transactions, edit only gives BOC access to attach new files or edit existing attachments. 
AND they can also update "Comments" and "BOC Notes" fields
AND saving will save the tx and its current values and reload the form in view mode

title: Delete a designate for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has edit permissions for a designate for release or assignment tx
AND the tx is in preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Delete"
custom_expected:
THEN a warning will display "Are you sure you want to delete this [form]? ("Form" to be replaced with transaction type)"
AND after clicking yes the form should be closed and no record should be kept. User should be returned to entry point of the transaction and a blue notification should be thrown

title: BOC user can approve a designate for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND a Designate for release or assignment tx is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC or Rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN  the status will update to "Approved"
AND a successful blue notification will display
AND the item will be removed from the approvals clipboard
AND the player's Player History: Code = DFA, Description = Designated for Release or Assignment, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND set the player's MJ Roster Status to Designated for Assignment
AND set the player's MN Roster Status to null

title: BOC user can reject a designate for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND a Designate for release or assignment tx is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC or Rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN the status will update to "Rejected"
AND a successful reject notification is displayed
AND the item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND reverse player's Pending org and club, Pending MJ Roster Status and Pending MN Roster Status
AND remove pending player history entry

title: BOC user can reverse a designate for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND a tx is in a state of "Approved"
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Reverse"
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to "Reversed"
AND any action items that were generated as a result of this transaction being submitted or approved are removed
AND display reversed transaction in player history with Voided: in front of the transaction description
AND player's Club, MJ and MN Roster statuses and level of play will update to their values from prior to the transaction being approved
